mdRecord.dcterms:title: Amiss, M. H.; Leonard, George K. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Amiss, M. H.; Leonard, George K.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] We advise to annul the authority of JP Kiger to enroll the militia of this county & continue Geo. K. Leonard M.H. Amiss Chairman Mil Committee 22q76pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Amiss, M. H.; Leonard, George K.
